name: Minecraft
description: The heart and story of the game
tips: This is the root advancement - you get it automatically when you open your inventory.

name: Stone Age
description: Mine Stone with your new Pickaxe
tips: Craft a wooden pickaxe and mine any stone block.

name: Getting an Upgrade
description: Construct a better Pickaxe
tips: Craft a stone pickaxe using cobblestone and sticks.

name: Acquire Hardware
description: Smelt an Iron Ingot
tips: Mine iron ore and smelt it in a furnace.

name: Suit Up
description: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor
tips: Craft and equip any piece of iron armor.

name: Hot Stuff
description: Fill a Bucket with lava
tips: Craft a bucket and right-click on a lava source block.

name: Isn't It Iron Pick
description: Upgrade your Pickaxe
tips: Craft an iron pickaxe using iron ingots and sticks.

name: Not Today, Thank You
description: Deflect a projectile with a Shield
tips: Block a skeleton arrow or other projectile with a shield.

name: Ice Bucket Challenge
description: Obtain a block of Obsidian
tips: Pour water on lava source blocks to create obsidian, then mine it with a diamond pickaxe.

name: Diamonds!
description: Acquire diamonds
tips: Mine diamond ore found deep underground (Y level -64 to 16).

name: We Need to Go Deeper
description: Build, light and enter a Nether Portal
tips: Build a portal frame with obsidian and light it with flint and steel.

name: Cover Me with Diamonds
description: Diamond armor saves lives
tips: Craft and equip a full set of diamond armor.

name: Enchanter
description: Enchant an item at an Enchanting Table
tips: Build an enchanting table and enchant any item.

name: Zombie Doctor
description: Weaken and then cure a Zombie Villager
tips: Throw a splash potion of weakness at a zombie villager, then feed it a golden apple.

name: Eye Spy
description: Follow an Eye of Ender
tips: Throw an eye of ender and follow its direction to find a stronghold.

name: The End?
description: Enter the End Portal
tips: Find a stronghold and activate the end portal with eyes of ender.

name: Nether
description: Bring summer clothes
tips: Enter the Nether dimension through a nether portal.

name: Return to Sender
description: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball
tips: Hit a ghast fireball back at the ghast to kill it.

name: Those Were the Days
description: Enter a Bastion Remnant
tips: Find and enter a bastion remnant structure in the Nether.

name: Hidden in the Depths
description: Obtain Ancient Debris
tips: Mine ancient debris found at Y levels 8-22 in the Nether.

name: Subspace Bubble
description: Use the Nether to travel 7 km in the Overworld
tips: Travel 875 blocks in the Nether to cover 7000 blocks in Overworld distance.

name: A Terrible Fortress
description: Break your way into a Nether Fortress
tips: Find and enter a nether fortress structure.

name: Who is Cutting Onions?
description: Obtain Crying Obsidian
tips: Find crying obsidian in ruined portals or trade with piglins.

name: Oh Shiny
description: Distract Piglins with gold
tips: Give a gold ingot to a piglin to start bartering.

name: This Boat Has Legs
description: Ride a Strider with a Warped Fungus on a Stick
tips: Saddle a strider and control it with a warped fungus on a stick.

name: Uneasy Alliance
description: Rescue a Ghast from the Nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it
tips: Lure a ghast through a large nether portal to the Overworld, then kill it there.

name: War Pigs
description: Loot a Chest in a Bastion Remnant
tips: Open and loot a chest inside a bastion remnant.

name: Country Lode, Take Me Home
description: Use a Compass on a Lodestone
tips: Right-click a lodestone with a compass to link them.

name: Cover Me in Debris
description: Get a full suit of Netherite armor
tips: Upgrade a full set of diamond armor to netherite using a smithing table.

name: Spooky Scary Skeleton
description: Obtain a Wither Skeleton's skull
tips: Kill wither skeletons in nether fortresses for a rare skull drop.

name: Into Fire
description: Relieve a Blaze of its rod
tips: Kill a blaze in a nether fortress to obtain a blaze rod.

name: Not Quite "Nine" Lives
description: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum
tips: Use 4 glowstone blocks on a respawn anchor to fully charge it.

name: Feels Like Home
description: Take a Strider for a loooong ride on a lava lake in the Overworld
tips: Bring a strider to the Overworld and ride it 50 blocks on lava.

name: Hot Tourist Destinations
description: Explore all Nether biomes
tips: Visit all 5 Nether biomes: Nether Wastes, Soul Sand Valley, Crimson Forest, Warped Forest, and Basalt Deltas.

name: Withering Heights
description: Summon the Wither
tips: Build a T-shape with soul sand/soil and place 3 wither skeleton skulls on top.

name: Local Brewery
description: Brew a Potion
tips: Use a brewing stand with blaze powder, water bottles, and nether wart to brew potions.

name: Bring Home the Beacon
description: Construct and place a Beacon
tips: Craft a beacon using a nether star and place it on a pyramid of iron, gold, diamond, emerald, or netherite blocks.

name: A Furious Cocktail
description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time
tips: Apply all 13 potion effects simultaneously. Use beacons, potions, and golden apples.

name: Beaconator
description: Bring a Beacon to full power
tips: Build a full 4-layer pyramid under your beacon using 164 mineral blocks.

name: How Did We Get Here?
description: Have every effect applied at the same time
tips: Apply all 27+ status effects simultaneously. Requires extensive preparation including a shulker, elder guardian, wither, beacon, and many potions.

name: The End
description: Or the beginning?
tips: Enter The End dimension through a stronghold portal.

name: Free the End
description: Good luck
tips: Defeat the Ender Dragon boss.

name: The Next Generation
description: Hold the Dragon Egg
tips: Collect the dragon egg after defeating the Ender Dragon. Use a piston or make it fall on a torch.

name: Remote Getaway
description: Escape the island
tips: Enter an end gateway portal to reach the outer End islands.

name: The End... Again...
description: Respawn the Ender Dragon
tips: Place 4 end crystals on the exit portal to respawn the dragon.

name: You Need a Mint
description: Collect Dragon's Breath in a Glass Bottle
tips: Use an empty glass bottle on the Ender Dragon's breath attack.

name: The City at the End of the Game
description: Go on in, what could happen?
tips: Enter an End City in the outer End islands.

name: Sky's the Limit
description: Find Elytra
tips: Find elytra in an End Ship near End Cities.

name: Great View From Up Here
description: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker
tips: Get hit by shulker bullets and levitate 50 blocks upward.

name: Adventure
description: Adventure, exploration and combat
tips: Kill any hostile mob or get killed by one.

name: Voluntary Exile
description: Kill a raid captain. Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...
tips: Kill a pillager captain carrying a banner.

name: Is It a Bird?
description: Look at a Parrot through a Spyglass
tips: Craft a spyglass and look at a parrot through it.

name: Is It a Balloon?
description: Look at a Ghast through a Spyglass
tips: Use a spyglass to look at a ghast in the Nether.

name: Is It a Plane?
description: Look at the Ender Dragon through a Spyglass
tips: Use a spyglass to look at the Ender Dragon in The End.

name: Monster Hunter
description: Kill any hostile monster
tips: Kill any hostile mob like a zombie, skeleton, or creeper.

name: What a Deal!
description: Successfully trade with a Villager
tips: Complete a trade with any villager.

name: Crafting a New Look
description: Craft a trimmed armor at a Smithing Table
tips: Find an armor trim template and use it with armor at a smithing table.

name: Sticky Situation
description: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall
tips: Fall onto a honey block from a height that would normally damage you.

name: Ol' Betsy
description: Shoot a Crossbow
tips: Craft and fire a crossbow.

name: Sweet Dreams
description: Sleep in a Bed to change your respawn point
tips: Craft a bed and sleep in it at night.

name: Hero of the Village
description: Successfully defend a village from a raid
tips: Defeat all waves of a village raid triggered by Bad Omen.

name: Hired Help
description: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village
tips: Build an iron golem using 4 iron blocks and a carved pumpkin.

name: Star Trader
description: Trade with a Villager at the build limit
tips: Bring a villager to Y=320 and complete a trade there.

name: Smithing with Style
description: Apply these smithing templates at least once: Spire, Snout, Rib, Ward, Silence, Vex, Tide, Wayfinder
tips: Find all 8 specific armor trim templates and apply each one to armor.

name: Take Aim
description: Shoot something with an Arrow
tips: Craft a bow and arrows, then hit any entity.

name: Monsters Hunted
description: Kill one of every hostile monster
tips: Kill at least one of every hostile mob type in the game.

name: Postmortal
description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death
tips: Hold a totem of undying and take fatal damage to trigger its effect.

name: Two Birds, One Arrow
description: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing Arrow
tips: Use a crossbow with Piercing enchantment to kill two phantoms with one shot.

name: Who's the Pillager Now?
description: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine
tips: Kill a pillager with a crossbow.

name: Arbalistic
description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot
tips: Use Piercing IV crossbow to kill 5 different mob types with a single shot.

name: Adventuring Time
description: Discover every biome
tips: Visit all overworld biomes. Use F3 to check current biome.

name: Sound of Music
description: Make the Meadows come alive with the sound of music from a Jukebox
tips: Play a music disc in a jukebox while in a Meadows biome.

name: Light as a Rabbit
description: Walk on Powder Snow... without sinking in it
tips: Wear leather boots and walk on powder snow.

name: Surge Protector
description: Protect a Villager from an undesired shock without starting a fire
tips: Have lightning strike a lightning rod within 5 blocks of a villager during a thunderstorm.

name: Caves & Cliffs
description: Free fall from the top of the world (build limit) to the bottom of the world and survive
tips: Fall from Y=320 to Y=-62 and survive using water bucket or other methods.

name: Respecting the Remnants
description: Brush a Suspicious block to obtain a Pottery Sherd
tips: Use a brush on suspicious sand or gravel to uncover a pottery sherd.

name: Sneak 100
description: Sneak near a Sculk Sensor or Warden to prevent it from detecting you
tips: Crouch and sneak past a sculk sensor without triggering it.

name: Careful Restoration
description: Make a Decorated Pot out of 4 Pottery Sherds
tips: Craft a decorated pot using 4 pottery sherds.

name: Sniper Duel
description: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away
tips: Shoot and kill a skeleton from 50+ blocks away with a bow or crossbow.

name: Bullseye
description: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away
tips: Shoot an arrow into the center of a target block from 30+ blocks away.

name: It Spreads
description: Kill a mob near a Sculk Catalyst
tips: Kill any mob within 8 blocks of a sculk catalyst.

name: Birthday Song
description: Have an Allay drop a Cake at a Note Block
tips: Give an allay a cake and have it drop it at an active note block.

name: Revaulting
description: Unlock a Vault with an Ominous Trial Key
tips: Obtain an ominous trial key and use it to open an ominous vault in a Trial Chamber.

name: Under Lock and Key
description: Unlock a Vault using a Trial Key
tips: Defeat trial spawners to get trial keys, then use one on a vault.

name: Blaze It
description: Deflect a Breeze's wind charge with your Wind Charge
tips: Use a wind charge to deflect a breeze's attack in a Trial Chamber.

name: Who Needs Rockets?
description: Launch yourself with a Wind Charge and fall more than 7 blocks
tips: Use a wind charge to launch yourself and fall at least 7 blocks without dying.

name: Over-Overkill
description: Deal 50 hearts of damage in a single hit using the Mace
tips: Craft a mace and fall from a great height to deal massive smash damage.

name: Trial Chambers
description: Step foot into a Trial Chamber
tips: Find and enter a Trial Chamber structure underground.

name: Husbandry
description: The world is full of friends and food
tips: Eat any food item to unlock this advancement.

name: Bee Our Guest
description: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees
tips: Place a campfire under a beehive, then use a glass bottle on the hive when full.

name: The Parrots and the Bats
description: Breed two animals together
tips: Feed two animals of the same species their breeding food.

name: You've Got a Friend in Me
description: Have an Allay deliver items to you
tips: Give an item to an allay and have it collect and deliver matching items to you.

name: Whatever Floats Your Goat!
description: Get in a Boat and float with a Goat
tips: Push a goat into a boat on water and get in with it.

name: Best Friends Forever
description: Tame an animal
tips: Tame a wolf with bones, cat with raw fish, or other tameable mobs.

name: Glow and Behold!
description: Make the text of any kind of sign glow
tips: Use a glow ink sac on a sign to make its text glow.

name: Fishy Business
description: Catch a fish
tips: Use a fishing rod to catch any fish.

name: Total Beelocation
description: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 bees inside, using Silk Touch
tips: Use a silk touch tool to break a bee nest with 3 bees inside at night.

name: Bukkit Bukkit
description: Catch a Tadpole in a Bucket
tips: Use a water bucket on a tadpole to catch it.

name: Smells Interesting
description: Obtain a Sniffer Egg
tips: Find a sniffer egg in suspicious sand in warm ocean ruins.

name: A Seedy Place
description: Plant a seed and watch it grow
tips: Plant any seed on farmland.

name: Wax On
description: Apply Honeycomb to a Copper block!
tips: Right-click a copper block with honeycomb to wax it.

name: Wax Off
description: Scrape Wax off of a Copper block!
tips: Use an axe on a waxed copper block to remove the wax.

name: Two by Two
description: Breed all the animals!
tips: Breed every breedable animal type in the game at least once.

name: Little Sniffs
description: Feed a Snifflet
tips: Feed torchflower seeds to a baby sniffer.

name: A Balanced Diet
description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you
tips: Eat every food item in the game, including poisonous ones.

name: Serious Dedication
description: Use a Netherite Ingot to upgrade a Hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices
tips: Upgrade a diamond hoe to netherite at a smithing table.

name: Tactical Fishing
description: Catch a Fish... without a Fishing Rod!
tips: Use a water bucket on a fish to catch it.

name: When the Squad Hops into Town
description: Get each Frog variant on a Lead
tips: Lead all three frog variants: temperate, warm, and cold.

name: A Complete Catalogue
description: Tame all Cat variants!
tips: Tame all 11 cat variants found in villages and witch huts.

name: With Our Powers Combined!
description: Have all Froglights in your inventory
tips: Have all three froglight colors in your inventory at once.

name: Planting the Past
description: Plant any Sniffer seed
tips: Plant a torchflower seed or pitcher pod found by sniffers.

name: The Cutest Predator
description: Catch an Axolotl in a Bucket
tips: Find an axolotl in a lush cave and catch it with a water bucket.

name: The Healing Power of Friendship!
description: Team up with an axolotl and win a fight
tips: Have an axolotl help you kill a hostile mob.

name: Sniffer's Gift
description: Have a Sniffer dig up a seed for you
tips: Let a sniffer sniff and dig up a torchflower seed or pitcher pod.

name: A Furry Friend
description: Tame an Armadillo
tips: Use spider eyes to tame an armadillo found in savanna or badlands biomes.

name: Shear Brilliance
description: Shear an Armadillo
tips: Use shears on an armadillo to obtain armadillo scutes.

name: Good as New
description: Repair a damaged Wolf Armor using Armadillo Scutes
tips: Use armadillo scutes to repair damaged wolf armor.

name: The Whole Pack
description: Tame one of each Wolf variant
tips: Find and tame all 8 wolf variants from different biomes.

name: Minecraft (Story Root)
description: The heart and story of the game
tips: This is automatically obtained when opening your inventory.

name: Very Very Frightening
description: Strike a Villager with lightning
tips: Use a trident with Channeling during a thunderstorm to strike a villager.

name: A Throwaway Joke
description: Throw a Trident at something. Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.
tips: Throw a trident and hit any entity.

name: Lighten Up
description: Scrape a Lightning Rod with an Axe to wax it off
tips: Craft a lightning rod, wax it with honeycomb, then scrape it with an axe.

name: Distract the Piglins
description: Give a Piglin a Gold Ingot while it's aggressive at you
tips: Aggro a piglin and then throw a gold ingot at it to distract it.

name: Kill a Mob
description: Kill any hostile monster
tips: Kill any hostile mob to complete this advancement.

name: Obtain Netherite Hoe
description: Use a Netherite Ingot to upgrade a Hoe
tips: Upgrade a diamond hoe to netherite at a smithing table.

name: Trade at World Height
description: Trade with a villager at the top of the world
tips: Transport a villager to Y=320 and complete a trade.

name: Follow an Ender Eye
description: Follow an Eye of Ender
tips: Throw an eye of ender and follow its direction.

name: The Power of Books
description: Read the power of a Chiseled Bookshelf using a Comparator
tips: Place a comparator next to a chiseled bookshelf with books to read its signal.

name: The Breeding Master
description: Breed all the animals
tips: Breed every breedable animal at least once.

name: Ominous Trial
description: Enter a Trial Chamber with Bad Omen
tips: Get Bad Omen effect and enter a Trial Chamber for an ominous trial.

name: Minecraft: Trial Chambers
description: Enter a Trial Chamber
tips: Find and enter a Trial Chamber structure.
